div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: '646. Abschrift exp 10/5 76 R' [Copy sent 10 May 1876]. An accompanying label in J. G. Luehmann's handwriting reads: ' Books only An das Freie Deutsche Hochstift Frankfurt a/M Baron v Mueller .' MS annotation apparently by O. Volger: '645 646 Eing. 22/IV. 1876. Vier Bände // zwei Geschenk des Herrn Baron Ferd. v. Müller Mr FDH .//. zwei Geschenk der Regierung des Staates Victoria (Australien) V.' [Entered 22 April 1876. Four volumes // two gifts of Baron von Müller Mr FDH // two gifts of the Government of the State of Victoria (Australia)].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr. phil et med. Ferdinand Baron von Müller Mr FDH.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Zuschrift und Sendung vom 22/IV. d. J. enthaltend — neben zwei werthvollen Gaben von Seiten der hohen Regierung der Colonie Victoria, welche wir dieser hohen Stelle in besonderer Zuschrift zu verdanken und beehren — Ihre gütigen Schenkungen 1, Campbell: A year in the New Hebrides 2, Geological Survey of Victoria: Observations on new vegetable fossils of the auriferous drifts danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr phil. and med. Ferdinand Baron von Mueller Mr F.D.H.
Meister des Freies Deutsches Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy]. Academician Government Botanist Melbourne (Australia)

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed communication and consignment on 22 April this year containing your kind presentations 1 Campbell: A year in the New Hebrides
B73.13.01. 2 Geological Survey of Victoria: Observations on new vegetable fossils of the auriferous drifts
B74.13.07. — besides two valuable gifts on the part of the Government of the Colony of Victoria, for which we are thanking and honour this high place in a separate communication
There is a similar certificate of the same date, addressed to the Government of Victoria, thanking it for the gift of M's Fragmenta, vols 7 & 8 (K76/6605, unit 916, VPRS 3991/P, PROV). This has been signed 'G. H. Otto Volger Dr. gen Senckenberg' (President), ' Dr Adolf Petermann Mr. FDH' (Administrative clerk) and ' Ludwig Rosenberg' (Secretary). — we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.
